item.title: MAP Skills Professional Learning Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
Whether you’re new to MAP Skills or already apply the data in your instructional programs, our Professional Learning Consultants can help your teachers and intervention specialists deepen their understanding of

The post MAP Skills Professional Learning Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
Whether you’re new to MAP Skills or already apply the data in your instructional programs, our Professional Learning Consultants can help your teachers and intervention specialists deepen their understanding of the reports and personalized instruction. This fact sheet provides more detail about our available onsite and virtual workshops.

The post MAP Skills Professional Learning Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.

item.title: MAP Reading Fluency Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
This fact sheet introduces a new way to quickly and accurately assess your K-3 readers. Learn how MAP® Reading Fluency™ enables teachers to efficiently measure oral reading fluency, foundational skills,

The post MAP Reading Fluency Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
This fact sheet introduces a new way to quickly and accurately assess your K-3 readers. Learn how MAP® Reading Fluency enables teachers to efficiently measure oral reading fluency, foundational skills, and reading comprehension – in about 20 minutes.

The post MAP Reading Fluency Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
